评论详情: Good quality in person. I went a size up from my normal size to get a good oversize look. Otherwise it runs true to size if you don’t want it big
Super soft, quality is okay, ran larger
Thick and soft. Looks stylish and the color is exact.
It’s the perfect length, size and so incredibly soft! I will definitely be purchasing other colors!
True to size, easy to wear and great addition y in my wardrobe. Length is perfect I am 5’8 hits below knee and just roomy enough. Lined to keep its shape, not sloppy.
Super cute and just what I wanted but other reviewers are correct, it sheds!!!
It was beautiful, but it shed really bad! I had to return it. There was fuzz flying around my car for days!

Loved this coat! Very soft and warm. It was oversized so i had the snap moved to have it tighter around the waist. Also added one more snap. This coat is fabulous. Wear with jeans or dressy. You will love it!
Had to return. Started shedding too bad.

This coat looks really nice, but the quality is inconsistent. I first ordered a medium, which was way too large, but didn’t shed, and then ordered a medium, which I just received, but it is shedding all over my clothes.

I wasn't sure about this coat at first so I pulled up some styling ideas. It's now one of my favorites! Looks great with athleisure wear or dressed up. Ordered my usual size small and it's just oversized enough. So cozy!
Cute coat but it leaves a trail everywhere so travel with your lint brush if you plan to wear

评论概述: Wanted to love it, but it sheds.
评论详情: This was a beautiful soft coat, but it sheds and leaves fuzzies everywhere I went or sat.
Can I return this item to Amazon?  It has been difficult to return to Orolay.  I love the coat but it is much too large.

Won’t stop shedding. It’s all over my car and clothes. I can’t use it because of this. I’m not talking about just a little bit. It’s excessive! Update I paid lots of money to dry clean it so see if it would help with the shedding. It did not. Save your money. I’m very sad.
Beautiful coat and gray color makes it look more expensive than it is ❤️

It’s a decent coat but doesn’t have enough buttons to keep it closed. Amazon has a horrible way of packaging clothing in shrink wrapped plastic and it literally embeds wrinkles into items that won’t come out! My clothes shopping days from Amazon are over.
I found the pockets to be to high.  Poorly made.
It’s warm and soft but the quality is poor. The fur is literally blowing away in the wind.
Sheds EXCESSIVELY!  I will have to return it unfortunately.
A beautiful “ Teddy Bear” coat. I couldn’t expect more. Feels luxurious and arm. It’s yummy. Highly recommend this coat. The packaging exceeded my expectations. We’ll done!
Had planned on using this as a winter coat. Too small  Way too tight & small in chest & shoulders
It isn't cold enough to wear yet but I was really happy with it when I opened the package. I word the Orolay parka a lot last year, great value and super cute and useful. Big fan.

评论概述: I want to live in this coat!
评论详情: Such a beautiful well made coat. And so soft - I never want to take it off.

I love the coat but the delivery was left on the sidewalk, not infront of the door as instructed.  A photo was taken of a package infront of a door.  Not my door, not my package. Thankfully I was following the tracking carefully and saw on line that it was delivered. I saw it out my window by the curb.
This coat is Beautiful , Soft and luxurious… I love it! This is my second purchase from Orolay and I’m happy with both of my purchases! Very well made and well worth the cost! 😊

评论概述: Super Soft but Oversized is an Understatement
评论详情: I order an extra small and my jacket was enormous! You could have fit an entire family in there. collar is actually quite large as well; super soft - if I would have kept it, I would have used it as a winter blanket

I love this coat. Fabric lush and warm enough for transitional weather. The workmanship excelelnt too. I wear a size 4 petite and ordered a small but because the coat is oversized it was gigantic on me.

I am so in love with this coat! So stylish and looks like luxury. I want it to stay winter forever now since I have such an awesome faux fur coat. It's oversized as is in fashion and my kids just love hugs with it as it feels like a big bear
Totally cute. Fits perfect. Great for the  cooler weather we got last week. Very stylish. Got a lot of compliments.
Love how chic this coat is, it def runs oversized. It’s so warm and the quality is amazing!

Bellissimo capo, colore e pelliccia, rifiniture. Purtroppo devo rendere perchè piccolo x me peccato. 5 stelle comunque.
Caldissimo ed incredibilmente morbido, sembra un capo molto più costoso. veste avvolgente., per me è perfetto!
Eigentlich sehr schön, leider viel zu groß
Es erfüllt seinen Zweck und scheint sehr gut verarbeitet zu sein.
Der Mantel ist sehr schön und warm. Man sollte mit einer Fusselbürste einmal drüber gehen, dann fusselt es auch nicht mehr. Gute länge.
Bel materiale, molto caldo, bellissimo colore

Mantel entspricht voll den Erwartungen.
Beautiful coat lovely fit so comfortable colour good so pleased I brought it

Articolo consegnato in ritardo..corriere che ha scritto che non ero in casa..ma ero in casa. il cappotto è bello avvolgente caldo ma veste larghissimo.. ho pure preso una taglia in meno ma è comunque grande, dovevo prendere la M..Delusa.. avevo ordinato il colore grigio, mi è arrivato beige.. non mi piace questo colore. non rimando indietro perchè la consegna è stata problematica.. confezione rotta e si vedeva il prodotto.
The Coat is nice and soft and warm plus it's worth every penny

Very beautiful coat, I would surely recommend,

La taglia S è grande, corrisponde più a una 42/44 italiana. Il colore grigio  è caldo e molto bello. Purtroppo ho trovato in una tasca uno scontrino di novembre 2022, di una nota catena di ristoranti inglese. Mi chiedo, ma non c’è un controllo sui capi resi? Penso che questo cappotto invernale sia stato già usato per andare al ristorante…

Ein toller Mantel wirklich! Die Optik die Farbe der kuschlige Plüsch einfach toll ;))) Ich Liebe diesen Mantel!!! Verarbeitung alles Top! Ich trage normalerweise Größe M aber hier habe ich S bestellt und das war gut so. Ich bin begeistert gib ihn nicht mehr her. Die eine schlechte Bewertung ist überhaupt nicht zu verstehen. Aber das wird mit Sicherheit nicht an dem Mantel liegen!!! ;)))
Beautifully soft and warm, fits great.
Too oversized, overall not great. Update - the coat piles immensely. Fluff all over my top after trying it on, car belt wrapped in it. Please don't bother. K.
